meanings.definition: Used to express joy or approval.
meanings.sent1: Yay! I got an A on my test!
meanings.sent2: Yay, the sun is shining today!
meanings.sent3: Yay, I found my missing sock under the bed!
meanings.sent4: The crowd erupted in a loud yay when the team scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent5: The children's faces lit up with yay when they saw the colorful balloons.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of excitement or happiness.
meanings.sent2: Yay, we're going to the amusement park!
meanings.sent3: Yay, I finally finished reading that long book!
meanings.sent4: Her heart sang with yay as she watched the fireworks light up the sky.
meanings.sent5: The puppy's tail wagged in pure yay as it chased after the ball.
